meanings.definition: A person to whom a right or property is transferred or assigned.
meanings.sent1: The assignees received the keys to their new home.
meanings.sent2: The assignees of the project were responsible for its completion.
meanings.sent3: The assignees of the treasure map were thrilled to begin their adventure.
meanings.sent4: The assignees of the secret mission were the key to its success.
meanings.sent5: The assignees eagerly awaited their special delivery.

meanings.definition: The person to whom an assignment is made.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out the assignments to the assignees.
meanings.sent2: The assignees of the tasks completed them with efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The assignees of the group project celebrated their victory.
meanings.sent4: The assignees of the roles in the play brought the story to life.
meanings.sent5: The assignees proudly displayed their certificates of achievement.
